backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles with role-based access control, project and task management with comprehensive features (time tracking, comments, attachments, dependencies, recurring tasks, custom fields), and work submission functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds submissionTimestamp field to existing Task records, transforming OldTask to NewTask structure while preserving all other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including founder dashboard metrics, task assignment views, employee access control, and work submission functionality with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of frontend components and pages including dashboard, task management, project views, role-based navigation, and various hooks for backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes including colors for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Team Task Manager application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup, route guards for admin-only pages, profile setup modal, overdue task notifications, and role-based routing logic.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Reusable access denied component displaying a destructive alert with shield icon and custom error message for unauthorized access attempts.
frontend/src/components/CreateProjectMod: A modal dialog component for creating new projects with name and description fields, using a form that generates a unique project ID and calls the useCreateProject hook on submission.
A comprehensive modal for creating tasks with fields for title, description, assignee, project, dates, priority, dependencies, and recurring task settings, integrating multiple hooks to fetch projects, users, and tasks.
frontend/src/components/CustomFieldDispl: A simple display component that renders custom fields in a two-column grid layout, showing field names and values.
frontend/src/components/CustomFieldInput: A reusable input component for custom fields that supports text, number, date, and dropdown types with conditional rendering based on the field type.
frontend/src/components/DashboardMetrics: Displays four key metrics (total tasks, completed tasks, completion percentage, and active projects) in a responsive grid of cards with icons and color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeTaskCard: A detailed task card component for employees showing task information, progress tracking, time tracking controls, and actions to update progress or submit completed work.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main application layout component with a sticky header, role-based navigation menu, user profile display with role badges, and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, toggling between login and logout states with loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/OverdueNotificat: A notification badge component that displays a bell icon with a count of overdue tasks, hidden when no tasks are overdue.
frontend/src/components/OverdueTaskNotif: A modal dialog that automatically appears when users have overdue tasks, listing them with days overdue and providing options to dismiss or view tasks.
frontend/src/components/OverdueTasksList: Displays a list of overdue tasks sorted by days overdue, showing task details, assignee, due date, and project. Shows a success message when no tasks are overdue.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile by entering name, selecting role (founder/employee), and optionally selecting employee type (teacher/admin). Cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/components/ProjectList.tsx: Displays all projects in a responsive grid with progress bars showing completion percentage and task counts. Shows empty state when no projects exist.
frontend/src/components/ProjectProgressC: Card component displaying a single project's name, description, progress bar, and task completion statistics (completed/total tasks).
frontend/src/components/RecurrencePatter: Small component that displays a recurring task's frequency pattern and next occurrence date with a repeat icon.
frontend/src/components/TaskActivityFeed: Shows a chronological activity feed for a task including status changes, progress updates, comments, and time entries sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/components/TaskAssignmentsT: Sortable table displaying task assignments with columns for title, employee, project, due date, priority, and status. Supports sorting by multiple fields and highlights overdue/completed tasks.
frontend/src/components/TaskAttachmentsS: Manages task file attachments with upload functionality (max 10MB), progress tracking, and download buttons for existing attachments using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/TaskCommentsSect: Displays a task's comments with author names and timestamps, and provides a form to add new comments with real-time submission feedback.
frontend/src/components/TaskDependencyIn: Shows task dependencies with completion status indicators, displaying whether a task is blocked by incomplete dependencies.
frontend/src/components/TaskFilterContro: Provides UI controls for filtering tasks by priority (with checkboxes) and sorting by priority, due date, or reminder date, with active filter badges.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Renders a list of task cards with details like priority, status, assignee, due date, progress, attachments, and overdue indicators, with links to individual task pages.
frontend/src/components/TaskProgressSlid: A simple slider component for adjusting task progress percentage from 0-100% in 5% increments.
frontend/src/components/TasksByEmployeeV: Groups and displays tasks organized by assigned employee, showing each employee's task list with priority, status, due dates, and progress indicators.
frontend/src/components/TasksByProjectVi: Groups and displays tasks organized by project, showing each project's task list with assignee, priority, status, due dates, and progress indicators.
frontend/src/components/TaskTimeLogDispl: Displays total time logged on a task, with optional detailed view showing individual time entries by user with start/end times and durations.
frontend/src/components/TimeTrackingCont: React component that displays a timer UI for starting/stopping task time tracking, showing elapsed time with a live-updating clock display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
Mutation hook for adding attachments to tasks, invalidating task-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddTaskComment.ts: Mutation hook for adding comments to tasks, invalidating task-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateProject.ts: Mutation hook for creating new projects with id, name, and description, invalidating the projects list on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Mutation hook for creating tasks with full configuration including assignment, priority, dependencies, recurring settings, and custom fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTaskTemplate: Mutation hook for creating reusable task templates with priority and custom fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllProjects.ts: Query hook that fetches all projects from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllTasks.ts: Query hook that fetches all tasks with automatic refetching every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllTaskTemplate: Query hook that fetches all task templates from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllUsers.ts: Query hook for fetching all users with principal, name, and role (currently returns empty array).
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAssignedTasks.t: Query hook that fetches tasks assigned to the current user with automatic refetching every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile with enhanced loading state handling.
Query hook that fetches the current user's role from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetProjectReport.t: Query hook that fetches a project report from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetUserName.ts: Query hook that fetches a user's name by principal with 5-minute caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOverdueTaskNotific: Hook that manages overdue task notifications with session-based dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook for saving the current user's profile, invalidating profile and role queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartTaskTimer.ts: Mutation hook for starting a task timer, invalidating task queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useStopTaskTimer.ts: Mutation hook for stopping a task timer, invalidating task queries on success.
Mutation hook for submitting completed work for a task, invalidating task queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskProgress: Mutation hook for updating task progress percentage, invalidating task queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/FounderDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page for founders/admins displaying project progress cards, task assignments table, metrics overview, overdue tasks, and filterable/sortable task views grouped by project or employee.
frontend/src/pages/GanttChartPage.tsx: Gantt chart visualization page showing task timelines with progress bars, supporting daily/weekly/monthly zoom levels and displaying task priorities and project associations.
frontend/src/pages/MyTasksPage.tsx: Employee task page displaying tasks assigned to the current user with filtering by priority and sorting options, using backend authorization to enforce access control.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: User profile management page allowing users to update their name and role type, displaying role badges and admin status with form validation.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Projects listing page with conditional create project button for admins, displaying all projects using the ProjectList component.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Analytics and reporting page showing completion rate, average task duration, on-time delivery percentage, and productivity trends with export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/TaskDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single task including metadata, progress, comments, activity feed, attachments, dependencies, time logs, and time tracking controls. Provides navigation back to task list and handles loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Main tasks page displaying all tasks with filtering by priority and sorting options (priority, due date, reminder date). Includes task creation modal and uses TaskList component for rendering.
frontend/src/pages/TaskTemplatesPage.tsx: Manages task templates with a list view and creation dialog. Allows users to create reusable task templates with title, description, and priority settings.
frontend/src/pages/WorkloadViewPage.tsx: Displays team workload distribution showing active task counts per user with capacity visualization and overload indicators. Uses cards to present each user's workload status.
frontend/src/utils/fileUtils.ts: Provides utility functions for file handling including formatting file sizes, validating file types against allowed types, and extracting file metadata.
frontend/src/utils/ganttUtils.ts: Calculates timeline ranges and positioning for Gantt chart visualization of tasks. Determines start/end dates and computes left/width percentages for task bars.
frontend/src/utils/recurrenceUtils.ts: Formats recurrence patterns from RecurrenceFrequency objects into human-readable strings for daily, weekly, and monthly frequencies.
frontend/src/utils/reportUtils.ts: Exports report data to JSON format including completion rates, task duration, delivery metrics, and productivity trends with client-side download functionality.
frontend/src/utils/taskUtils.ts: Comprehensive task utility functions including overdue checking, date formatting, progress calculation, priority-based filtering/sorting, and badge color generation for task priorities.
frontend/src/utils/timeUtils.ts: Formats time durations into human-readable strings (hours/minutes) and calculates total minutes between bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Manages URL parameters and session storage for both regular and hash-based routing, including extraction, persistence, and cleanup of URL parameters with support for sensitive data removal.
frontend/src/utils/workloadUtils.ts: Utility that calculates workload data for users by counting active tasks (progress < 100%) per user and flagging users as overloaded if they have more than 8 active tasks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, spacing, animations, and theme extensions for a design system with sidebar, chart, and UI component tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a school management app with role-based authentication, task/project management, progress tracking, dashboards, and overdue task notifications for founders and employees.
